verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
His name is wonderful
(3x)
Jesus my Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He is the mighty King
Master of everything
His name is wonderful,
Jesus my Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's the great shepherd,
The rock of all ages,
Almighty God is He,

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Worship and adore Him
His name is wonderful
Jesus my Lord
